name: campaign_quarter_clusters
description:
Identifies high-performing campaign combinations (Goal, Segment, Channel, Duration Bucket) for the current quarter (last 3 months of data).
It calculates average performance metrics for each combination, compares them against company and global averages, and ranks them based on individual metrics and a weighted composite score.
The model also determines an optimal duration range for each Goal-Segment-Channel combination based on the highest ROI and flags the top 10% performing combinations as 'winning combinations'.
This model provides insights for campaign optimization dashboards.

columns.name: Company
columns.description: The company associated with the campaign combination.

columns.name: goal
columns.description: The primary goal of the campaigns in this combination (e.g., Brand Awareness, Increase Sales).

columns.name: segment
columns.description: The target customer segment for the campaigns in this combination.

columns.name: channel
columns.description: The marketing channel used for the campaigns in this combination (e.g., Facebook, Instagram).

columns.name: duration_bucket
columns.description: The duration range category for the campaigns in this combination (e.g., '1-7 days', '15-21 days').

columns.name: avg_conversion_rate
columns.description: The average conversion rate for all campaigns within this specific combination for the quarter.

columns.name: avg_roi
columns.description: The average Return on Investment (ROI) for all campaigns within this specific combination for the quarter.

columns.name: avg_acquisition_cost
columns.description: The average cost to acquire a customer for all campaigns within this specific combination for the quarter.

columns.name: avg_ctr
columns.description: The average Click-Through Rate (CTR) calculated as SUM(Clicks) / SUM(Impressions) for all campaigns within this specific combination for the quarter.

columns.name: campaign_count
columns.description: The number of individual campaigns included in this combination for the quarter. Only combinations with >= 3 campaigns are included.

columns.name: min_duration
columns.description: The minimum duration (in days) among campaigns in this combination for the quarter.

columns.name: max_duration
columns.description: The maximum duration (in days) among campaigns in this combination for the quarter.

columns.name: avg_duration
columns.description: The average duration (in days) of campaigns in this combination for the quarter.

columns.name: conversion_rate_vs_company
columns.description: The ratio of this combination's average conversion rate to the company's overall average conversion rate for the quarter (>1 is better than company average).

columns.name: roi_vs_company
columns.description: The ratio of this combination's average ROI to the company's overall average ROI for the quarter (>1 is better than company average).

columns.name: acquisition_cost_vs_company
columns.description: The ratio of the company's overall average acquisition cost to this combination's average acquisition cost for the quarter (>1 means this combination has lower cost than company average).

columns.name: ctr_vs_company
columns.description: The ratio of this combination's average CTR to the company's overall average CTR for the quarter (>1 is better than company average).

columns.name: conversion_rate_vs_global
columns.description: The ratio of this combination's average conversion rate to the global average conversion rate across all companies for the quarter (>1 is better than global average).

columns.name: roi_vs_global
columns.description: The ratio of this combination's average ROI to the global average ROI across all companies for the quarter (>1 is better than global average).

columns.name: acquisition_cost_vs_global
columns.description: The ratio of the global average acquisition cost to this combination's average acquisition cost for the quarter (>1 means this combination has lower cost than global average).

columns.name: ctr_vs_global
columns.description: The ratio of this combination's average CTR to the global average CTR across all companies for the quarter (>1 is better than global average).

columns.name: conversion_rate_rank
columns.description: Rank of this combination within the company based on average conversion rate (1 = highest conversion rate).

columns.name: roi_rank
columns.description: Rank of this combination within the company based on average ROI (1 = highest ROI).

columns.name: acquisition_cost_rank
columns.description: Rank of this combination within the company based on average acquisition cost (1 = lowest acquisition cost).

columns.name: ctr_rank
columns.description: Rank of this combination within the company based on average CTR (1 = highest CTR).

columns.name: composite_rank
columns.description: Overall rank of this combination within the company based on the weighted composite score (1 = best overall performance).

columns.name: composite_score
columns.description: A weighted score calculated from individual metric ranks (ROI: 40%, Conversion Rate: 30%, Acquisition Cost: 20%, CTR: 10%). Lower score indicates better overall performance.

columns.name: optimal_duration_bucket
columns.description: The duration bucket associated with the highest average ROI for this specific Company-Goal-Segment-Channel group.

columns.name: optimal_min_duration
columns.description: The minimum duration (in days) observed within the optimal duration bucket for this Company-Goal-Segment-Channel group.

columns.name: optimal_max_duration
columns.description: The maximum duration (in days) observed within the optimal duration bucket for this Company-Goal-Segment-Channel group.

columns.name: is_winning_combination
columns.description: Flag indicating if this combination ranks in the top 10% within its company based on the composite score (TRUE = winning combination).

columns.name: is_optimal_duration
columns.description: Flag indicating if this combination's duration_bucket matches the optimal_duration_bucket determined for its Company-Goal-Segment-Channel group (TRUE = uses optimal duration).

columns.name: optimal_duration_range
columns.description: A formatted string representing the suggested optimal duration range based on the highest ROI for the Company-Goal-Segment-Channel group (e.g., '15-21 days').
